standard_metadata.standard_description: Fluently add and subtract multi-digit whole numbers using the standard algorithm.

images.alt: A stacked addition problem. The equation shows 236,181 plus 150,486. 1 one plus 6 ones is 7 ones. Next to the stacked equation is 1 plus 6 equals 7.
